us.jonesrychtar.gispatialnet
Class DataSet

java.lang.Object
  us.jonesrychtar.gispatialnet.DataSet

public class DataSet
extends Object

Author:
sam,charles This class holds the primary data for GISpatialNet. Code is pulled from the util class, because these are not utility functions, they are functions for manipulating the data we have. Also, this allows for calling GISPatialNet gsn = new GISPatialNet; if ((gsn.getData()).loadCSV("data.csv")){ //do something with data }

Parameters:
d - The level of detail you want to use when calling toString(). The values are: 1: Print all the matrix values. 2: Also print the Matrix.toString() value

append

public void append(DataSet ds)
Appends another DataSet to this one. Appends each matrix in the new to this one.

Parameters:
ds - the DataSet to Append to this

add

public DataSet add(DataSet ds1,
                   DataSet ds2)
Calls append() to add two DataSets together. This method does not change either DataSet. If you want to add one DataSet to another, use append().

Parameters:
ds - the DataSet to Append to this
Returns:
A new DataSet

Border

public void Border(String filename,
                   int alg)
            throws IllegalArgumentException,
                   MalformedURLException,
                   IOException,
                   org.geotools.feature.SchemaException
Performes a borders analysis on data, writes out edge shapefile

Parameters:
alg - Algorithm to use Options: 0 - default Borders algorithm
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException
MalformedURLException
IOException
org.geotools.feature.SchemaException

QAP

public void QAP(String[] arg)
         throws IllegalArgumentException,
                IOException,
                Error,
                CannotProceedException
Performs QAP analysis on data

Parameters:
arg - Examples: Simple Mantel test: -s file1 file2 number_of_randomizations Partial Mantel test: -p file1 file2 file3 number_of_randomizations Options: -r partial Mantel test with raw option -e force exact permutations procedure -l print licence terms -h display help
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException
IOException
Error
CannotProceedException

Highlight

public void Highlight(int alg,
                      String filename,
                      String nodeFilename)
               throws IllegalArgumentException,
                      MalformedURLException,
                      IOException,
                      org.geotools.feature.SchemaException
Highlighrs edges and saves edge shapefile

Parameters:
alg - Which algorithm to use
filename - output filename Algorithms: 0 less than average length 1 less than median length 2 more than median length 3 top 10 percent
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException
MalformedURLException
IOException
org.geotools.feature.SchemaException

combined XY Matrix. use SplitXYAttb() to split into respective coords.
